description: Students continue to develop the listening, speaking, reading and writing skills that enable them to deal not only with topics of daily life, but also cultural themes and authentic materials. Class meets four times weekly. Prerequisite: Japanese 231 or its equivalent. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Intermed Japanese II
notes: Students in Japanese 232 must also register for lab Japanese 232 L.
prerequisites: Japanese 231 or its equivalent. Offered annually in the spring semester.
